title: "How data-driven feedback in surgical robotics can help democratize access to surgery"
excerpt: "The goal is not to enable a robot to perform complex surgeries without human involvement. But using surgical robotics to democratize access to quality care to underserved communities is an outcome that we can achieve and which the world needs."
